metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16156 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
CPAN 2.28 allows Signature Verification Bypass.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.36 - 5.36.0-4ubuntu2
perl - 5.36.0-4ubuntu2
perl-base - 5.36.0-4ubuntu2
perl-debug - 5.36.0-4ubuntu2
perl-modules-5.36 - 5.36.0-4ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.36.0-4ubuntu2').
